name: Kawaii Kitchen: Cute As Hell
description:
Welcome to the Kawaii Kitchen! A restaurant located at the intersection of cuteness and cuisine! Take a load off and follow an employee, Eliza, as she goes through her day working at the cuteness capital of the world! Join her on an adorable adventure with her colorful cast of co-workers. As the day goes on, you may find out why the only thing better than being cute, is being cute as Hell.

Kawaii Kitchen: Cute As Hell was made by these wonderful members of the Kawaii Kitchen Crew, and brought to life by our fantastic voice cast!

Voice Cast

Eliza: Played by Tabetha McNeal

Lili/Nina: Played by Brittany Ann Phillips

Samson: Played by Walter Mack

Soma: Played by Ronald Simms

Kawaii Kitchen Crew

Writer/Co-Director: Michael Willis Jr*

Character Artist/Co-Director: Jordan Williams

Background Artist: pinkeggyolk

CG Artist: Lumeria Daydreamon

Composer: Kyle Van Dyke
